description:
Wooser plays a game where one player is the werewolf, and the others are villagers trying to find him.  The game is popular with middle school and high school girls, which is why Wooser likes it. He`s a villager, so will he be able to find the wolf in time?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Murabito Wooser, Sono Kemono no Honshou
The Villager Wooser and His True Bestial Nature
村人うーさー, その獣の本性
